changeSet.author: CWDS TPT-3 Team
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ADDRS_T ( IDENTIFIER CHAR(10) NOT NULL , CITY_NM CHAR(20) NOT NULL , EMRG_TELNO DECIMAL(10,0) NOT NULL , EMRG_EXTNO INTEGER NOT NULL , FRG_ADRT_B CHAR(1) NOT NULL , GVR_ENTC SMALLINT NOT NULL , MSG_TEL_NO DECIMAL(10,0) NOT NULL , MSG_EXT_NO INTEGER NOT NULL , HEADER_ADR CHAR(35) NOT NULL , PRM_TEL_NO DECIMAL(10,0) NOT NULL , PRM_EXT_NO INTEGER NOT NULL , STATE_C SMALLINT NOT NULL , STREET_NM CHAR(40) NOT NULL , STREET_NO CHAR(10) NOT NULL , ZIP_NO INTEGER NOT NULL , LST_UPD_ID CHAR(3) NOT NULL , LST_UPD_TS TIMESTAMP NOT NULL , ADDR_DSC CHAR(120) NOT NULL , ZIP_SFX_NO SMALLINT NOT NULL , POSTDIR_CD CHAR(2) NOT NULL , PREDIR_CD CHAR(2) NOT NULL , ST_SFX_C SMALLINT NOT NULL , UNT_DSGC SMALLINT NOT NULL , UNIT_NO CHAR(8) NOT NULL );
